notConfigured.title: Not Configured
notConfigured.description: Please enter the CONFIG_API_URL of the Fedimint guardian server to point at.

connect-guardians.invite-guardians-help: Share this link with the other Guardians
connect-guardians.table-description: Guardians will be confirmed here once they confirm Federation settings.

federation-dashboard.invite-members: Invite members to join the federation
federation-dashboard.invite-members-prompt: Share this to invite members to join the federation

gateways.label: Lightning Gateways
gateways.no-gateways-info-description: Lightning node operators can connect to your federation to provide Lightning Network interoperability. Once connected, they will appear here.

config.label: Federation Config
config.missing-meta-module: Editing Meta fields is not possible. The Meta module is not available for this federation.

manage-meta.description: Fedimint can supply your users with additional information (metadata) about the Federation, such as a name, welcome message, or image. While this information does not affect the custody of funds, all the Guardians must agree on the metadata.
manage-meta.label: Manage Meta

confirm-modal.title: Confirm Approval
confirm-modal.description: Your approval will reach the threshold to adopt this meta change. Your new meta will look like:

manage-meta.no-consensus-meta-message: there are no meta in consensus
manage-meta.no-submitted-meta-message: there are no meta edits to review
manage-meta.setup-meta-title: Setting up a Meta for your Federation
manage-meta.setup-meta-description: Fedimint can supply additional information to clients in the form of meta fields: key-values pairs with arbitrary information you might want to share with clients. While these meta fields are not interpreted by Fedimint, they are consensus relevant, i.e. they cannot differ between federation members. This way clients can rely on their correctness.
manage-meta.propose-updates: As a fedimint guardian, you can propose updates to the meta which will be accepted by the other guardians. Once the update is accepted by a threshold of guardians, it will be adopted as the new consensus meta for the federation.
manage-meta.core-meta-fields: The following meta fields have been defined as part of the core Fedimint protocol and are useful to include for your federation's meta:
manage-meta.meta-field-expiry: A unix timestamp after which the federation will shut down.
manage-meta.meta-field-name: The human-readable name of the federation
manage-meta.meta-field-icon: A URL to a logo icon for the federation
manage-meta.meta-field-welcome: A welcome message for new users joining the federation
manage-meta.meta-field-gateways: A list of gateway identifiers vetted by the federation
manage-meta.your-own-fields: You can also add your own arbitrary meta fields to the proposal. These will be added to the meta of all clients that connect to your federation and can be used for any purpose you like.

danger-zone.guardian-warning-message: WARNING: Do not share this code with anyone. Anyone with this code can authenticate as a Guardian. Ensure you are in a private location and no one is watching your screen.

backup.label: Backup
backup.title: Download Backup
backup.warning-text: The backup contains private keys and secret material for the federation guardian and must be kept secure. Recovery using this backup requires your admin password!

sign-api-announcement.label: Sign API Announcement
sign-api-announcement.title: Sign API Announcement
sign-api-announcement.current-api-url: Your API URL from Local Config
sign-api-announcement.announced-api-url: Your API URL from Federation Announcements
sign-api-announcement.urls-match: Your current API URL matches your announced API URL.
sign-api-announcement.urls-mismatch: You've changed the API URL in your local config and need to broadcast a new API announcement.
sign-api-announcement.sign-tooltip: Sign the API announcement to announce your API URL to the federation.

schedule-shutdown.label: Schedule Shutdown
schedule-shutdown.title: Schedule Shutdown
schedule-shutdown.description: Schedule your guardian node to shutdown after a specific session height for a coordinated upgrade of your fedimintd binaries.
schedule-shutdown.session-to-shutdown-helper: Enter the session height at which you want to shutdown your guardian node.

connect-service-modal.label: Connect a Service
connect-service-modal.title: Connect a Fedimint Service
connect-service-modal.helper-text: Will be wss:// for guardian or https:// for gateway

remove-service-modal.title: Remove {{type}}
remove-service-modal.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this {{type}}?

leader.label: Setup Leader
leader.description: Enter configuration settings that other Guardians approve. One Guardian acts as Setup Leader.

follower.label: Follower
follower.description: Once a Setup Leader sets the configurations, other Guardians choose this option to approve the settings and create the Federation.

solo.label: Solo
solo.description: Operate Fedimint as a Solo Guardian without consensus, fault tolerance, federated backups, or other resilience benefits of Fedimint. Proceed with caution, not intended for production use.

warning-modal.title: Is everyone ready?
warning-modal.description: Exiting the setup ceremony may cause the setup to fail and require you to restart your guardian. Make sure everyone is ready to run the full setup before continuing!

bitcoin-node.not-synced-description: Your Bitcoin node is currently {{progress}}% synced. You must wait for full synchronization before proceeding.

run-dkg.error-config: Failed to run distributed key generation. Federation setup must be restarted.
run-dkg.error-default: Not ready for DKG, your current status is

set-config.bft-explanation-title: Byzantine Fault Tolerance of Your Federation
set-config.bft-explanation: A {{total}} Guardian Federation creates a {{honest}}/{{total}} Threshold.
set-config.bft-faulty: Your Federation will be able to tolerate {{faulty}} faulty, offline, or malicious Guardians without impacting the Federation's operations.
set-config.guardian-name-help: This random name will be shown to other Guardians during setup
set-config.acknowledge-backed-up: I, {{guardianName}} (your guardian name), promise that I have backed up and secured my password:
set-config.admin-password-set: Click 'Generate' to create a secure password. You can modify it, but this password must be secure and backed up!
set-config.admin-password-help: Back up this password and keep it safe! You cannot recover this password!
set-config.admin-password-backup: I am using a strong password and have backed it up. (You cannot recover this password!)
set-config.join-federation-help: Ask the person who created the Federation for a link, and paste it here.
set-config.guardian-number-help: Federations require a minimum of 4 guardians. This cannot be changed later.
set-config.block-confirmations-help: Fedimint Guardians trail the blockchain tip by several confirmations to avoid block reorganizations.
set-config.block-confirmations-help-mainnet: Running on Mainnet requires at least 5 additional confirmations.
set-config.block-confirmations-warning: Running Fedimint with less than 5 additional block confirmations is extremely risky! Fedimint CANNOT handle blockchain reorganizations.
set-config.set-rpc-help: Source of bitcoin block data for your guardian node
set-config.error-valid-min: Please input a number of at least {{min}}.
set-config.error-valid-max: Please input a number of at most {{max}}.
set-config.error-valid-min-max: Please input a number between {{min}} and {{max}}.
set-config.password-warning: You MUST back up your password and keep it safe. This password is required to access your guardian dashboard. You CANNOT recover it if you lose it!

warning.title: Do not exit or refresh during setup!
warning.description: Exiting during setup may cause the setup to fail and you will have to do a fresh restart.

common.restart-setup-alert: The Setup Leader has restarted the Setup Ceremony. Please click "Restart" below to continue.
common.confirm-restart-setup: Are you sure you want to restart the Setup Ceremony?
common.confirm-restart-setup-alert: Clicking "Restart" will restart the ceremony for all Guardians.

set-config.title: We need to set some configurations for your Federation
set-config.title-solo: We need to set some configurations for your Solo Federation
set-config.subtitle-leader: Your Federation Followers will confirm this information on their end.
set-config.subtitle-solo: Running a Solo Federation loses many of the benefits of Fedimint. You will not have fault tolerance consensus to a guardian being offline and not be able to do federated backups. Proceed with caution, not recommended for production use or use with mainnet Bitcoin.
set-config.subtitle-follower: Your Federation Leader will be setting up main Federation details. Youâ€™ll confirm them soon.

connect-guardians.subtitle-leader: Share the link with the other Guardians to get everyone on the same page. Once all the Guardians join, youâ€™ll automatically move on to the next step.
connect-guardians.subtitle-follower: Make sure that the information here looks right, and that the Federation Guardians are correct. Click the Approve button when youâ€™re sure it looks good.

run-dkg.title: Success!
run-dkg.subtitle: All Guardians have validated federation setup details. Running some numbers...

verify-guardians.title: Verify your Guardians
verify-guardians.subtitle: Ask each Guardian for their verification code, and paste them below to check validity. Weâ€™re almost done!
verify-guardians.leader-confirm-done: Confirm that all the follower Guardians have clicked "Next" and see their guardian dashboards before continuing.
verify-guardians.leader-confirm-done-emphasis: Clicking "Continue" will complete the setup ceremony.

setup-complete.leader-message: All Guardiansâ€™ verification codes have been verified.
setup-complete.follower-message: You're all done! Let the other Guardians know you're running!

verify-guardians.error-peer-id: Unable to determine which peer you are. Please refresh and try again.
verify-guardians.verification-code-help: Share this code with other guardians
verify-guardians.table-description: Enter each Guardianâ€™s verification codes below.
verify-guardians.wait-all-guardians-verification: Waiting for all Guardians to verify their codes
verify-guardians.all-guardians-verified: All Guardians have verified their codes

balance-card.your-balance: Your eCash balance on this federation:

connect-federation.heading: Connect to a federation using an invite code
connect-federation.information-bar-text: The number of federations you can connect to is limited to one. Connecting to multiple federations will be supported soon.
connect-federation.label: Connect String:
connect-federation.sub-heading: The invite code is a long string that begins with â€˜fed1â€™

receive.peg-in-instructions: Send Bitcoin to this address to peg into your {{federationName}} Ecash Balance

send.ecash-created: Pulled a {{amount}} ecash note from your {{federationName}} balance. Send it to the recipient to claim.
